settings.title: The Science Explained
settings.content: Antibacterial silver has been used for years as a safe way to stop smell and bacterial spread. Silver ions bind to bacteria to prevent them from reproducing.

settings.title: Visible results in 4 nights
settings.content: Designed by dermatologists to recover your skin overnight and protect it from irritation- and acne-causing bacteria. This pillowcase with silver ions will give you better sleep and real results.

settings.title: Repels Bacteria Like An Invisible Forcefield
settings.content: Our pillowcases can have 1000x more bacteria than your toilet seat, shown to clog pores and trigger breakouts. Like an invisible forcefield, Snoozy's silver stops 99.7% of the nasties before they affect your skin.

settings.faq_question: What if Snoozy doesn't work for me?
settings.faq_answer: If for any reason you feel that Snoozy isn't working for you or you're simply not vibing it, simply send us an email to hello@snoozy.com.ph and we'll fix you up with a full refund.

settings.faq_question: Is Snoozy really safe to sleep on?
settings.faq_answer: It sure is! Silver has been used for decades (centuries, actually) as a safe way to stop bacterial spread. The silver ions also are infused into the fabric and cannot be inhaled, in case you were wondering!

settings.faq_question: Will the antibacterial effects wear off over time?
settings.faq_answer: Yes, but very slowly. In fact, even after 50 washes, the antibacterial decrease is just 1% (still 98% effective).

settings.faq_question: How do I track my order?
settings.faq_answer: We'll send you a tracking code as soon as the package has left our premise!

settings.faq_question: Can children or pregnant women use Snoozy?
settings.faq_answer: Yep! Our silver technology is perfectly safe for children and pregnant women.
